name: abs2difabsi
body: |- wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmin, cfv(cabs, c1))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmin, cfv(cabs, c1))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
